title: What are some Italian phrases that everyone should know? - Quora

response.answer_text: Come stai? (How are you?) Non ho capito, puoi ripetere? (I didn't understand, can you repeat?) Arrivederci (formal way to say: see you soon or bye) Buongiorno/buonanotte/buonpomeriggio (goodmorning, goodnight, goodafternoon) Mi piace/Non mi piace (I like It, I don't like It) Benvenuto/benvenuti/benvenuta/benvenute (welcome - variants are the genders and plural forms)

Grazie mille - thank very much prego - you're welcome Per favore - please Scusi - Sorry or also Excuse me ciao - hello buon giorno (till 3 pm) - good morning or good afternoon buona sera - good evening arrivederci - good bye a presto - see you soon
